about_the_game:
Fuel Station Simulator is a game where you can dive into the exciting world of entrepreneurship. Choose your own path of development and transform an abandoned gas station into a popular hub. Invest in upgrades and expansions, face various challenges, and attract both travelers and locals. Test your business skills and see if you have what it takes to succeed!

Cashier

Expand your business by opening a store and taking on the role of a cashier. Scan products, process payments, and boost your profits through excellent customer service.

Store Management

Design your store according to your own style and preferences. Arrange shelves, organize products, and create an attractive environment for customers.

Drive and Explore

On foot, you won't get far, but a car could change everything. Acquire a vehicle to easily travel between the many diverse locations on the expansive map. Handle deliveries yourself and explore the vast open world, discovering new opportunities and areas to expand your business.

Develop and Expand

Development is the key to success. Add more pumps and hire staff to serve multiple customers at once. Don't limit yourself to just a gas station—open a store, build restrooms, and more. Expenses will rise, but so will your income. Your task is to ensure that your revenues exceed your costs. Good luck!

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
